text: @seanhannity @AlexBerenson @DrOz @LindseyGrahamSC @marklevinshow @KarlRove Are @realdonaldtrump and the administration deliberately withholding  coronavirus tests so the number of cases are artificially low? Are they willing to state the 469,000 reported cases (as of 10 p.m. ET) is accurate? If not, are calls to end cautions reckless, perhaps deadly?
